# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #31](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#31)

#### Day 31

*He doesn't want to fight in Andor*
, Elayne thought.
*He doesn't want to fight alongside me. He wishes the break to be clean.*
(p. 193)
